shots.title: Replace sprint card with terminology table in SeeItInAction
shots.notes: Swapped the mini sprint-card visualization for a 5-row terminology mapping table. Cleaner visual, teaches vocabulary faster.

shots.title: Replace proof bar chart with stats wall
shots.notes: Replaced 4-bar handicap trajectory chart with 3 bold stat cards (fairway %, GIR %, handicap). Powered by live-stats API with animateCounter.

yardage_book_updates: Proof section now uses stats.handicap.all_time for outcome metrics instead of handicap_milestones
animateCounter works well for integer stats; decimal stats need direct .textContent assignment
course_management_notes: Both tickets were surgical replacements — swap one visual for another, same data source.
Clean sprint, no hazards. Par 3 with 0 slope — familiar patterns throughout.
